universum.studios.android.preference

Class SharedPreferencesPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.preference.SharedPreferencesPolicy

  • public final class SharedPreferencesPolicy
extends Object
    Simple class that declares basic policies for SharedPreferences.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SharedPreferencesPolicy.Mode
      Defines an annotation for determining allowed file creation modes for SharedPreferences file.

      Suffix for default name used by the Android for shared preferences.

      Copied flag from Context.MODE_APPEND.

      Copied flag from Context.MODE_PRIVATE.

      static String defaultPreferencesName(Context context)
      Creates a default name for shared preferences for the specified context that is the same one as created by default by the Android framework.

    • Method Detail

      • defaultPreferencesName

        public static String defaultPreferencesName(@NonNull
                                            Context context)
        Creates a default name for shared preferences for the specified context that is the same one as created by default by the Android framework.
        Parameters:
        context - The context for which to create preferences name.
        Returns:
        Preferences name that may be used in association with Context.getSharedPreferences(String, int).
        See Also:
        preferencesName(Context, String), PreferenceManager.getDefaultSharedPreferencesName(Context)

      • preferencesName

        public static String preferencesName(@NonNull
                                     Context context,
                                     @NonNull
                                     String nameSuffix)
        Creates a name for shared preferences with the given nameSuffix for the specified context.
        Parameters:
        context - The context for which to create preferences name.
        nameSuffix - Suffix to be added into preferences name.
        Returns:
        Preferences name that may be used in association with Context.getSharedPreferences(String, int).
        See Also:
        defaultPreferencesName(Context)
